import java.util.*;
import java.math.*;

public class ex20_2pro1
{		
	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		BigDecimal num = new BigDecimal(sc.nextDouble());
		System.out.println(num.abs());
	
		BigDecimal num2 = new BigDecimal(sc.nextDouble());
		System.out.println(num2.abs());			
	}
}
